description: You are logged in and you can view your completed studies, see your applications to Finnish Educational Institutions and see what information is stored in the national data warehouse for early childhood education and care - Varda.
notification: My Studyinfo has a maintenance break on Monday 23 September 2024 at 11:00-14:00 (UTC+3). During the break, the functions of My Studyinfo are not in use. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the break.

login.info: My Studyinfo has a maintenance break on Friday 25 October 2024 at 11:00-14:00 (UTC+3). During the break, the functions of My Studyinfo are not in use. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the break.
